WorkItem.ClosedComment: There is already a Bind Status filter
WorkItem.Description:
With all the talk of fixing the filters and parsing at the moment, particularly including the relevant T10 pieces in the VOA section AND the Frost Emblem section, I thought i'd bring up the addition of a filter for BoE items.    
Â 
More for the many ICC drops than the crafted items which are already easily dealt with in the crafted section of filters.   It would make using Rawr to gear a new toon up to ICC ready much easier.

Comments.Message: Already in the works. A simple filter to show all BOE items. Even if ICC is not selected it will still show BOE drops from ICC.
